name: Whale & Dolphin + Turtle Combo
description: Live two adventures at a Super Price Promotion. Our combos tours can be taken at different times, not more than 7 days apart. Whales & Dolphins + Turtles Combo offers the Whale & dolphin ride in the morning and go to the turtle camp at night. Or if you prefer the turtle camp one day and another day the Whale & dolphin tour, or vice versa. You decide.
